segments.text: John , I was looking through some magazines for ideas about where we might go on vacation this year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've already told my buddy , Mark , that I am going hunting with him in Alaska .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , I've always gone hunting or fishing on vacation . I am sorry that bothers you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: After a year together , I thought it pretty safe to assume that we would automatically spend our vacation together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Says who ? I don't think that is necessarily the case .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , now that I think about it , I really don't have much more to say to you at all !
segments.speaker: S1
